metadata.name: The Corrupted Eye
metadata.description: "There are whispers amongst the scattered camps of strange serpentine beings from beyond the stars. Legend has it that one such creature left a fragment of stone somewhere deep within the dunes. A blood red eye said to hold a corrupted power. If you bring me this stone I will exchange it for my finest goblin mercenary. You may take him into your service, and I will take the corruption into mineâ€¦"
